comment.author: 68002240@N05
comment._content: Ju388L-1 codedFE-4010/T-2-4010 werlnummer 560049 after capture by US Forces at Allgemeine Transport Gesellschaft factory at Merseburg from where it was transferred for servicing with the 10th Air Depot Group in May 1945. Survived until today at NASM See LEMB www.luftwaffe-experten.org/forums/index.php?showtopic=632
